definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: This paper introduces the beam profile characteristics of excimer lasers and the beam profilometry.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了准分子激光的波面特性以及波面分析测量技术。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the beam profile characteristics of excimer lasers and the beam profilometry.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了准分子激光的波面特性以及波面分析测量技术。

sentences.english: The correlation between the skewness and the kurtosis of the sea surface elevation is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中还讨论了波面偏度和峰度的相关关系。

sentences.english: Be objects, or wavefront-like point in the discrete value.
sentences.chinese: 得到物体或波面在离散样点上的值。

sentences.english: On the blue surface of thine aery surge.
sentences.chinese: 在你的磅礴之气的蔚蓝的波面。

definition: gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
to beat against the shore (of waves)
